name: A Game About Something
description:
Made in April 2016 for the 18th gm(48) game jam.

The theme was "Space".

Well...

I didn't exactly plan ahead, so the result is chaotic to say the least. It's not good. It's not bad. It's not even a game. I don't know what it is. One can only wonder what it would end up being had I developed it further.

This version is almost exactly the same, I just fixed some of the bugs and polished it a teeny bit.

Still not sure if it's even worth sharing...

- blokatt
